channel.title: Horrible Lag On Login
channel.description:
For some odd reason I get horrible lag when I login, and I've been getting this lag for about a week now and I figured out when it happens and when it doesn't.
If I login and spawn in my house at bryan's and manbearpigs town, I get a frame per second. I can't move, type or do anything. If I login and spawn at spawn, it is completely fine. I can go into the town and I have no problems at all.
I started thinking if it was some redstone machine left on, but if it was that, wouldn't I lag if I appear at spawn and walk over to the town as well?
So I have no clue what it is, but I am very annoyed by it. Most people hate it when they spawn at spawn, but I love it because it means I can actually play.
I am pretty sure this is only happening to me, but I could be wrong. If anyone else is having this problem, please tell. I just hate that I have no clue how to fix it.
EDIT: I also know it isn't optifine that is doing it. I just used a default 1.8.1 jar and it still lags.

item.title: Horrible Lag On Login
item.dc:creator: @Spankr_Poodle Spankr Poodle
item.description:
@Spankr_Poodle wrote:

For some odd reason I get horrible lag when I login, and I’ve been getting this lag for about a week now and I figured out when it happens and when it doesn’t.

If I login and spawn in my house at bryan’s and manbearpigs town, I get a frame per second. I can’t move, type or do anything.
If I login and spawn at spawn, it is completely fine. I can go into the town and I have no problems at all.

I started thinking if it was some redstone machine left on, but if it was that, wouldn’t I lag if I appear at spawn and walk over to the town as well?

So I have no clue what it is, but I am very annoyed by it. Most people hate it when they spawn at spawn, but I love it because it means I can actually play.

I am pretty sure this is only happening to me, but I could be wrong. If anyone else is having this problem, please tell. I just hate that I have no clue how to fix it.

EDIT: I also know it isn’t optifine that is doing it. I just used a default 1.8.1 jar and it still lags.

Read full topic
